channel.title: Please read ad reply! Important!

item.title: Please read ad reply! Important!
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

Hello everyone i’m having trouble with the Equipment Interface.

Now I have it working, but it seems to be a bit messed up
I have the bonuses updating fine and everything but the rotating character is the default RuneScape character (the bald guy)
and not my character? What do I do?
I suppose it’s something with the add char and etc.? let me show you my codes…

public static void addChar(int ID) { Class9 class9 = aClass9Array210[ID] = new Class9(); class9.anInt250 = ID; class9.anInt236 = ID; class9.anInt262 = 6; class9.anInt217 = 0; class9.anInt214 = 328; class9.anInt220 = 136; class9.anInt267 = 168; class9.aByte254 = 0; class9.anInt230 = 0; class9.anInt269 = 650; class9.anInt270 = 150; class9.anInt271 = 0; class9.anInt257 = -1;
Add char code above…^^

What’s wrong then?

Read full topic
